title: Joints and connections
fullText:
Joints and connections in protective earthing conductors shall be mechanically and electrically sound and protected against mechanical damage, corrosion and vibration.
Joints shall be accessible for inspection, testing and maintenance unless one of the following applies:
(a) Enclosed in a wall or ceiling.
(b) Made with a permanent crimp.
(c) Welded.
(d) Made within electrical equipment.
